$interpreted: Jahan: This is preposterous! Wait here any longer and we'll all be skeletons!
Furygrowl: The escort is arriving soon. We would be most grateful if you could wait a little longer.

Jahan: WELL. Tell him to HURRY UP~
It's bloody hot outside! Trying to barbeque us?
Sione: Colonel Augustinus. They've apologized, we can afford to wait.
Jahan: It just won't do~ Her Highness has taken a long journey all the way down from the castle. This weather is insufferable, if the princess
Jahan: suffers from heatstroke, will you take responsibility for that? HMM?
Jahan: Sione, you have the sensitivity of a blunt instrument~ That's why you were demoted to deserted areas like Totemtaff in the first place.
Sione: ......
Angelia: Jahan, I'm fine. Thank you, truly.
Jahan: Oh my~ The princess is SO considerate. I guess the heat isn't that bad. I could use a tan anyways.
Dagger: Finally here. Requests a visit and yet is terribly late. Kingdom of the Sun is indeed quite the star!
Jahan: WHO DO YOU THINK YOU ARE?! How dare you disrespect the princess in such a manner!
Angelia: I'm truly sorry. Unforeseen circumstances caused our delay.
Angelia: I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Please forgive us.
Dagger: Forget it. We won't pursue this any further.
Angelia: So that means, there will be a next time? Thank you very much!
Dagger: Ah? No no no, not my decision...
Angelia: I am Angelia Carlos, daughter of the late king, William Carlos.
Angelia: And may I ask the gentleman's name?
Dagger: Your Highness, my-my name is Dagger...
Dagger: Jeez. Why am I stammering!
Furygrowl: AHA. Dagger's completely smitten!
Dagger: Pipe down, will you?!
Dagger: Let's get down to business. If you want to meet Chieftain Crushfang, follow behind!
Angelia: Of course. Sir Dagger, please lead the way.
Sione: Your Highness, don't I need to send bodyguards along for your safety?
Angelia: No need. I asked for the peace treaty. I do not wish to give off the wrong impression.
Jahan: But-But-But... how can this be? What if Your Highness gets injured? We'd be blamed by His Majesty King Theodore!
Angelia: Then I will explain it to my dear uncle. Don't worry, just wait outside for me.
Sione: As you wish, Your Highness.

Jahan: Sione, you...
Your Highness, please reconsider~ Your Highness!
Angelia: Wow, what a beauty!
Dagger: Hey! Stop wandering. Caves are complicated; it'd be a nightmare if you get lost!
Angelia: I'm sorry... I never wandered far from the Kingdom when I was a young child.
Angelia: All of this exotic scenery, it draws me in...
Angelia: Ooh! What's that adorable thing?
Dagger: Those are Golems...
Dagger: Hey, I said quit running off!
Angelia: You said they're called Golems?
Dagger: Mhm. When they mature, gem rocks will sprout upon their backs.
Dagger: The gem rocks in here were left behind by ancient Golems centuries ago.
Angelia: The Bears seem to hold them in high esteem?
Dagger: Legend has it that King Golem once saved Bears from extinction.

Dagger: This is why Bears have the utmost respect for Golems,
and how we came to live together in Totemtaff.
Angelia: Is it in the Sunbeam Book, the legend where hero Vendacti set the sun free by slaying the dragon?
Angelia: How come I never heard about the Bears' history?
Dagger: That's the Kingdom's legend. Bears have their own culture. Either way, we're visiting Chieftain,
Dagger: stop wasting time, and stay near me!
Angelia: Eh? Sir Dagger?
Angelia: Oh no, I've managed to lose Sir Dagger's path, what should I do...
Angelia: Little ones, do you live here too?
Dagger: STEP ASIDE!

Dagger: I said to follow CLOSELY!
Which part of that did you not understand?!
Angelia: S-Sorry...
Dagger: Can't tell friend from foe, and blind to danger even when it's up in your face. You're a magnet for trouble.
Dagger: What are fragile flowers like you doing in Totemtaff?!
Angelia: I'm really sorry. My worldly experiences are lacking, even King Theodore accuses me for being too naive.
Angelia: But now I'm here, because I truly want to make an effort for peace between our tribes.
Dagger: Conflicts between the Bear tribe and the Kingdom of the Sun have been going on for decades. What makes you think YOU can solve it on your own?
Angelia: I-I-I...
Dagger: King Theodore was right, you're way too naive. Why don't you just get lost in your fantasy land?!
Angelia: Naive, perhaps, but please give me a chance! Whatever it takes, I will carry out my royal duties as princess.
Angelia: As for earlier, my most sincerest apologies.
Dagger: Forget it, as long as you're unharmed. You're young, time will teach you, as it has taught me.
Angelia: I'm not that young, I'll be twenty years old in three months, an adult.
Dagger: You're already nineteen years old? I didn't realize you were older than me!
Angelia: If I may ask, Sir Dagger, you are...?
Dagger: I'm thirteen years old. What's the matter?
Angelia: No... nothing...
Angelia: Not wise to make the Chieftain wait. We should get moving.
Dagger: Uh... please follow me closely. For real this time!

What makes you think YOU can solve it on your own?","sfxName":"t0032_story_024_ver1","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_002_002_dialog_english##_16_003","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I-I-I...","sfxName":"h0021_story_019","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_002_002_dialog_english##_16_004","SpeakerName":"Dagger","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0032","IconName":"t0032s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"King Theodore was right, you're way too naive. Why don't you just get lost in your fantasy land?!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_002_002_dialog_english##_17_000","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Naive, perhaps, but please give me a chance! Whatever it takes, I will carry out my royal duties as princess.","sfxName":"h0021_story_018","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_002_002_dialog_english##_17_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"As for earlier, my most sincerest apologies.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_002_002_dialog_english##_18_000","SpeakerName":"Dagger","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0032","IconName":"t0032s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Forget it, as long as you're unharmed. You're young, time will teach you, as it has taught me.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_002_002_dialog_english##_18_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s4_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm not that young, I'll be twenty years old in three months, an adult.","sfxName":"h0021_story_028","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_002_002_dialog_english##_18_002","SpeakerName":"Dagger","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0032","IconName":"t0032s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're already nineteen years old? I didn't realize you were older than me!","sfxName":"t0032_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_002_002_dialog_english##_18_003","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If I may ask, Sir Dagger, you are...?","sfxName":"h0021_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_002_002_dialog_english##_18_004","SpeakerName":"Dagger","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0032","IconName":"t0032s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm thirteen years old. What's the matter?","sfxName":"t0032_story_018_ver2","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_002_002_dialog_english##_18_005","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"No... nothing...","sfxName":"h0021_story_019","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_002_002_dialog_english##_18_006","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Not wise to make the Chieftain wait. We should get moving.","sfxName":"h0021_story_016","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_002_002_dialog_english##_18_007","SpeakerName":"Dagger","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0032","IconName":"t0032s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Uh... please follow me closely. For real this time!","sfxName":"t0032_story_019_ver1","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
